Es verdad que no vienen en caja de pl√°stico, muy bonitos para la presentaci√≥n pero poco √∫tiles para guardarlos, as√≠ que puede que apple los haya quitado para ahorrar costes. Sin embargo vienen envueltos en una caja de cart√≥n al m√°s puro estilo apple con todo lujo.Est√©ticamente y compar√°ndolos cent√≠metro a cent√≠metro son exactamente iguales, los de Amaz√≥n el auricular es un blanco mas brillante, pero eso puede ser que los mios est√©n ya desgastados por el uso y por eso no brillen, pero el tama√±o, grosor, est√©tica es exactamente el mismo.Ahora vamos a lo importante, soy un tio gordo, feo, calvo y hace tiempo que no se me levanta pero puedo decir con orgullo que si algo tengo es BUEN OIDO y comparando los 2 auriculares el sonido es exactamente el mismo, puedo garantizar en un 99% que son originales pero a mitad de precio que en las tiendas apple.Si estos me duran 2 a√±os como los otros los volver√© a comprar.

name: Skullcandy Cassette Wireless On-Ear Headphone with Mic (Black)

reviews.title: Good for listening loud new age music.
reviews.text: Sound: low end has great amount of punch. Highs are pretty decent. Mids are a bit boxy. Not suitable for mid oriented songs. Great for edm, hip hop, dubstep. Not very good for rock, metal, acoustic.The sound is very loud.Comfort: ear cushions are really very soft and overall build up is quite flexible. Though it has low durability so be handle carefully. Sadly it hurts the ear if worn for longer duration, like for over half an hour. If comfort is your top priority then it is not upto the mark.Noise cancellation: decent in the segment. Not very effective overall.Bluetooth: never had any issue with connectivity. Connects quickly.Microphone : mic is not very clear. Could be better.Battery life: it is good. You can easily play medium-loud music for 12-15 hours continuous. Full charge in less than hour. Aux is also available if battery goes off.VERDICTpros: heavy bass, loud, rich highs, Bluetooth, aux is also available, battery, looks (subjective).Cons: boxy Mids, low on comfort, bad micBuy if : you like listening to loud music and kick and bass oriented songs like hip hop, edm, New age pop.Don't buy: for gaming, for mixing mastering audio, for listening old songs, rock/metal, acoustic or other Mids oriented songs, or for zoom meetings and phone calls.Edit: been using it for 8 months now. It's still the same. All over a warmer sound. Sound is VERY LOUD. No issue with durability, connectivity, battery. Due to boxy mids and over-all warm nature of the product, sound clarity is compromised a bit. It doesn't have that sizzle in the sound.Good for slow music or heavy bass orientated music. Not very good for details.

reviews.title: Good Quality
reviews.text: Ordered Chill grey model but received Black. Sound on bluetooth mode is good but when connected through aux cable volume is very low and sound quality decreases. Charging cable is too small.

reviews.text: Audio player

reviews.title: Skullcandy delivers everytime
reviews.text: I haven't tried many headphones to write a review but I'll write what I feel1. Comfort- the cushions are smooth and perfect. You can listen to long hours without any discomfort2. Build quality is good for this price range. These aren't too hard on ear too3. Sound quality is very good. You can expect that from skullcandy. Tones are good. Bass is not very high but enough for a normal listener. If you are a bass lover, then that's some drop for you.4. Sound quality is more better with the aux connected as is the case with all other wireless headphones4. Charging 10 min give upto 1hr 30min of listening time. Good for taking and making callsCons: 1. I think the audio volume is not great. You can't hear it loud enough till you increase it to more than 70%2. No noise cancellation but upto 60% of the noise is impeded by the on ear cushions. You can't expect more noise cancellation at this price.Overall, a great purchase. Highly recommended at this price range. Don't doubt. You can go for it

reviews.title: Good for beginners but not for music lovers
reviews.text: Cons : A good headphone must have proper balance of all frequencies. I don't why there is so much hype for bass boosted headphones these days. I previously used an Audio Technica headphone. Every frequency was crystal clear there. This product might be a charm for the beginners but not for the music lovers.Pros : 1) Noise reduction is good  2) Pads are soft. It doesn't hurt ears even after long use.  3) Both wire & bluetooth are working fine

reviews.title: Excellent Set of Headphones. Wish it can in all Red.
reviews.text: This is one of the best ever headphones I have purchased. Amazing sound. Unbelievable battery life. Great looker ( I got the blue one ) Crystal clear sound. Great bass wherever needed. Awesome for watching movies and listening to music. I am in the music industry. So I know my sound. At this price this is an awesome buy. Just handle it with a bit of care. It‚Äôs a little delicate. So you might damage it if you throw it around. And pls get a case for it cause it doesn‚Äôt come with one in the pack. Don‚Äôt think too much if you want to buy a super pair of headphones for a very very decent price. Just go for it. Absolutely recommended.

reviews.title: NOT DURABLE AT ALL- made of Weak Material- cracks easily
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United Kingdom üá¨üáß on 18 October 2022
reviews.text: It has only been a year and they already need to be replaced because their body is cracking and falling apart.  It doesn't take much to crack the material since it is so brittle and fragile (I don't even use them on the go or abuse them)They look nice and are comfortable enough to wear, but do hurt my ears when worn for a long time. Their battery life is amazing and lasts for a few days on a single charge, depending on use (and volume of sound). I can't say much regarding the sound quality because I am not informed or bothered about it. All I can say is that if it sounded terrible I would know it but these ones sound just fine to me.

reviews.title: Cheap and quite good

The sound is nice, no buzz with bass, everything sounds well balanced. Haven't used them for anything other than listening to music on my android. It pairs easily enough. They are comfortable for prolonged periods of listening. Just be careful whist handling them, they feel like they could be broken eeasily by accident.

Yo los compr√© en color morado y es tal cual se muestra en la imagen.

reviews.title: MI MEJOR COMPRA DE AUDIFONOS DE ESTE A√ëO
reviews.text: Los compr√© en el mes de septiembre ya que me sorprendi√≥ el precio por lo que ofrec√≠a.Son bastante c√≥modos, ya que la diadema no aprieta tanto.La bater√≠a me dur√≥ aproximadamente 20 horas y media (el fabricante promete 22) pero lo que me gust√≥ y el pues de estos aud√≠fonos es que son h√≠bridos, si se te acaba la bater√≠a puedes ponerle el cable de 3.5mm y podr√°s seguir escuchando m√∫sica.En cuanto a la relaci√≥n calidad precio para m√≠ son los MEJORES aud√≠fonos por debajo de 650 pesos mexicanos($32 d√≥lares) que puedes encontrar en el mercado, los bajos son potentes y aunque los graves (escucho m√°s metal y rock) no son taaaan altos realmente se disfruta escuchar musica con estos aud√≠fonos, la latencia con su BT 5.0 es estupenda ya que puede llegar hasta 10 metros despu√©s de 2 paredes, sin duda alguna son aud√≠fonos B, B, B.

name: JBL Endurance RunBT, Sports in Ear Wireless Bluetooth Earphones with Mic, Sweatproof, Flexsoft eartips, Magnetic Earbuds, Fliphook & TwistLock Technology, Voice Assistant Support (Black)

reviews.title: An exceptional set of earphones at dirt cheap price !
reviews.text: Ok guys, first thing first- I'm no audiophile (or whatever those music aficionados are called!)So, this review is by a normal guy for normal users.I've added close up photos for reference.The packing: Excellent. Very neatly packed, and very classy. (I had to struggle while opening the inner packet. Couldn't notice the cellotape which was holding it. Stupid me üôÑ)The build quality- It's exceptionally well built headset. Everything oozes quality. JBL have really put in their best in this product.Audio quality (that's what matters finally !) : I'm just blown away by the quality of sound! As I said earlier, I'm no audiophile. So, things like highs, lows, mids , treble etc don't make much sense to me. I already own Sony XB450 and Sennheiser 212HD. Both are "over-the-ear" wired types. So, they are supposed to be having bigger drivers etc and hence better sound quality. BUT. I actually feel this Endurance run gives them a run for money.. The bass was a little less, yes, but you can always increase bass with your music app settings. I'm typing this right now while listening to "Teri mitti" from Kesari. The song has a different level of effect with these earphones! And a major reason behind that is the noise cancellation. Coming on that now.Noise cancellation- I had bought JBL 600 BTNC with active noise cancellation last month. The Noise cancellation was so bad and sound quality so sub-standard that I was forced to return it... But, this set is a different beast! Of course, it has passive noise cancellation. However, even with medium volume, I can't hear anything spoken by my wife (that's of course not good for my health and well being in the long run! Haha). The  noise blocking by this set is phenomenal to say the least. You can barely hear anything from outside unless it's really loud.Comfort: have been listening to music for last 3 hours. No pain in ears at all (ear pain/discomfort is so common with most of earphones). The earplugs don't come out at all. Exceptionally snug fit.Tried Google now. "Ok Google" Works like a charm.Very easy to pair, took me barely 5 seconds the first time! Range also seems pretty good, but to be frank, haven't checked from much distance.Buttons on the band are easy to use, and I got used to them within no time. The central button (for play/pause or call) is slightly elevated than the volume buttons on both side of it, so you can touch and feel it. Can't go wrong. Pressing the volume + button for 2 seconds plays the next track (and similar for volume-). Again, intuitive and easy to use.I can go on and on. However, I'm not getting paid for this review. So, need to end this now.üòâJust one crib- there should be a way to switch off the blue status LED light, it irritates eyes in the dark (I know, that's a very very minor hassle. However, if I've missed and there really IS some way, do let me know).Thanks for reading (if you had the patience to read till here!). By the way, it's supposed to be splash resistant as well. No, I'm not going to check that.Go, buy it, wear it and go for a run. Regularly. Let's get fitter !  :-)

reviews.title: Produto veio com caracter√≠sticas de usado e com defeito.
reviews.text: O produto chegou, j√° achei estranho vim totalmente descarregado e com cheiro de perfume forte, apresentando marcas no bot√£o play. coloquei pra carregar, passo mais de 4 horas e continuou apresentando led vermelho, tirei do carregador e tentei conectar o bluetooth, mas nenhum dos aparelhos conecta, n√£o aparece em nenhum. E fica aparecendo sempre o led vermelho. Acredito que o produto est√° com defeito e esse cheiro de perfume horr√≠vel e marcas de uso nos bot√µes  da a entender que esse produto j√° foi usado.J√° abrir o processo de devolu√ß√£o!

reviews.title: N√£o durou muito
reviews.text: De in√≠cio achei √≥timo, atendeu bem √†s minhas expectativas ao fazer exerc√≠cios e tudo mais. Mas n√£o durou muito. Em 3 meses come√ßou a apresentar problema para o conectar o bluetooth e depois de mais umas duas semanas ele n√£o ligava mais. Uma pena!

reviews.title: Qualidade JBL pra quem quer suar
reviews.text: O fone surpreende pela boa qualidade de som, algo de se esperar num JBL.Os bot√µes e controles s√£o um pouco grandalh√µes e desajeitados, mas percebe-se que isso √© para proteger o equipamento do suor.Os encaixes para a orelha funcionam em dois modos (encaixe simples, para uso corriqueiro, e encaixe completo, para corrida). No 2o modo ele fica bem firme e dificilmente escapa, mas uso prolongado (mais de 2 horas) come√ßa a incomodar um pouco.A bateria dura MUITO, o que √© √≥timo.O modo headset (para usar com computador, por exemplo) tem qualidade de √°udio bem pior. O ideal √© usar mesmo como fone de ouvido.

reviews.title: Ottimo prodotto
reviews.text: Scrivo questa recensione , sperando possa tornare utile a chi sta cercando una ottima cuffia per ascoltare musica e fare sport , nel mio caso Corsa.La faccio principalmente perch√© sono un appassionato di audio e conoscendo la JBL ero sicuro che acquistando queste cuffie non sarei rimasto deluso , e qui noni spiego le recensioni negative che ho letto....Cuffie arrivate in 1 giorno sempre grazie ad Amazon ma inutile continuare a fare i complimenti a questo colosso perch√© gi√† sappiamo di cosa stiamo parlando .Le cuffie si presentano in una bellissima scatolina con dentro tutto l'occorrente per caricarle e per adattarle al proprio orecchio.Materiali molto belli al tatto e confortevoli una volta indossate. ( Sembra di non averle)Le parti che ciondolano (comandi) non sono affatto fastidiose , quasi non si sentono per la loro leggerezza.La qualit√† audio √® eccezionale (chi dice il contrario mente) profondit√† dei bassi voto 9Medi voto 9Alti voto 9Se poi vogliamo confrontarle con cuffie da 300/400 euro sicuramente non sar√† la stessa cosa ma se la batteranno alla grande senza fatica.Quindi io afferm√≤ che sono cuffie eccezionali, comodissime , e con una qualit√† audio degna di marchi molto pi√π prestigiosi.Consiglio vivamente l'acquisto sia ai pi√π esigenti audiofili , ai runner che cercano una cuffia idonea e che non cada dalle orecchie , e a chi cerca un auricolare da indossare anche per lavoro.Spero che la mia recensione senza alcun interesse , possa esserci di aiuto.‚ö°

reviews.title: Aprovado para corrida
reviews.text: Utilizei em corridas de 5, 10 e 21Km em ritmo r√°pido. O fone se ajusta perfeitamente e n√£o cai, nem mesmo com o suor.A qualidade do √°udio √© √≥tima e os fones isolam bem os ru√≠dos externos.

name: (Renewed) Sony WI-C310 Wireless On Ear Headphone with Mic (Blue)

reviews.title: Product quality is not good.
reviews.text: I had been use before Sony Bluetooth headphones but the quality of sound is quite different I don't know why this happened for the same product and I am not happy with this product.

reviews.title: Balanced Sound - Good Built - Great Battery
reviews.text: POSITIVES:+ Build: Light Weight to wear. Tanglefree Flat Wires. The wire around the neck is Flexible hence becomes very compact to store.+ Battery Backup: I got 16 Hrs at 60% Volume..!!+ Sound Quality: Might not appeal to a guys for whom the only definition of sound is only BASS. Guys who appreciate a good balanced sound (typically SONY Signature) will love it.C Type Charging Port: The future standard and no need to see which one is the right way to insert into the charging slot.SPECIAL TIP: Even if Medium-sized ear buds might be the right FIT. Try going ONE SIZE UP. It would seal the ear canal better, the BASS KICK improves. The buds are soft enough so comfort remains same.SMALL THOUGHTFUL DETAILS:1. Earbuds inner canals are colored in different colors to easily identify the sizes.2. A small groove is there on the left ear piece to identify the left from right.3. Everytime it powers ON a voice prompt updates the battery % left.4. When the battery is down to 20% the voice prompt gives LOW BATTERY status warning. And even at 20% of battery remaining I managed to get additional 3 Hrs..!!MIC FOR TAKING CALLS: Some of the reviews mention echo while taking calls. I haven't faced any issue whatsoever.

reviews.title: Good One
reviews.text: Advantages - Good base... awesome quality of sound for music... Call clarity also good ... Disadvantages are... Have to put earbuds while driving bcoz when call incoming no vibration..

reviews.title: Sony is always good. Product was like new.
reviews.text: Excellent but I could not understand abount this product and returned. But now think product sound quality was good I could not use in different songs and returned.

reviews.title: Sound quality is vary good but please improve battery power
reviews.text: Sound quality is very good but improve battery life

reviews.title: Good set of headphones.
reviews.text: Quality of headphones is good. Sound quality while playing music is also what you'd expect from Sony. No problem in the build quality, but I began to experience dropped Bluetooth connections when moving to another room in the house, sometimes it would start playing audio from phone speakers even though it was connected, and intermittent audio also once. Got rectified on restarting the headphones. Probably  this was returned due to the above reasons and then sold 'renewed'. I am also returning it and buying a new c200 instead.

reviews.title: Seemed like new - and works well
reviews.text: I wasn't sure what to expect with renewed but this one was as it was described. The outer box was a little scruffy (as one could have expected) but inside everything was pristine and has been working well since day one. Hopefully that continues.A Sony product you expect to be of top quality and the sound is good, connections are stable and the product has a quality feel to its construction. It sits well and it also looks good.The mic on this does make you hear yourself in the earphones which takes some getting used to but at this price point it would be surprising if it didn't.
